column4: I wonder if this would work: tether to the itouch, then set the itouch to send some packets to the computer at a certain time, and set the computer to WoL
jason_ostrowski, you were saying something to me?
- Yes, using Gparted to mount the partition?
- Thanks, Last Question - If I am able to mount it, do I then reboot and try to boot into the installed Ubuntu?
